message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit outside my budget.  Would you be willing to come down to $90?
Hi Bob, I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $110 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $95. Let's see if we can make this work.

Hi Bob, I understand that $110 was still a bit out of your budget, but I'm willing to make one more adjustment. I can offer it to you for $105. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's still a great deal for you!
